title: Putin Raises Concerns of ‘Catastrophic Deterioration’ in Gaza With Erdogan
description: The leaders expressed "deep concern over the growing number of civilian casualties and the catastrophic deterioration of the humanitarian situation," the Kremlin said.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia Upholds 7-Year Sentence for Opposition Activist
description: The activist, 63-year-old Mikhail Krieger, was sentenced in May on charges of "justifying terrorism" and "inciting hatred."
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: U.S. Offered Russia ‘Serious Proposal’ to Release Jailed American Paul Whelan – CNN
description: But the ex-Marine's Russian attorney said Tuesday that his release from prison was still “a work in progress.”
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Ukrainian Deliveryman Accused of Mass Poisoning Attempt – Kommersant
description: Yegor Semyonov reportedly delivered a poisoned cake and whiskey to a reunion party where dozens of alumni of a military aviation school were in attendance.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russian Propaganda Seizes on West's 'Double Standards' as Israeli Strikes Pound Gaza
description: By focusing on the brutality of Israel’s bombing in Gaza, pro-Kremlin propagandists have sought to justify the Russian army’s actions in Ukraine.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Kremlin Says No Success in Freeing Russian Hostages From Hamas
description: The Kremlin said it would continue working with "all sides" involved in the conflict in Israel as it seeks to secure the release of Russian citizens.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Navalny Back in Solitary Confinement After Writing Materials Taken Away
description: The jailed opposition activist, whose appearance has changed dramatically since he was imprisoned in 2021, has been in and out of solitary confinement for months.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Telegram Messaging App Restricts Access to Hamas Channels
description: Android users were notified that they are no longer able to access the channels of Hamas and its military wing, according to Russian state media reports.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia's Newest National Park Met With Skepticism from Experts
description: Independent conservationists said that the government is motivated more by “the need to create new protected areas” than actual conservation concerns.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Chechen Court Postpones Quran-Burning Trial
description: According to RIA Novosti, Nikita Zhuravel’s trial was postponed because neither the victims nor the witnesses involved in the case showed up in court.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia Says Detected Sea Drones in Crimea
description: The Russian Defense Ministry said three seaborne drones were fired on but it did not indicate whether they were damaged or destroyed.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Ex-NSA Employee Pleads Guilty to Trying to Spy for Russia
description: Jareh Sebastian Dalke tried selling top secret government documents in encrypted online communications to an individual he believed to be a Russian agent.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
